p: The Zhejiang Province is in the southeast China between longitudes 118 oE-123 oE and latitudes 27 oN-32 oN. There are two sub-provincial cities (HangZhou and Ningbo) and nine prefecture-level cities, including Wenzhou, Huzhou, Jiaxing, Shaoxing, Jinhua, Zhoushan, Quzhou, Taizhou and Lishui, which cover 90 counties( Fig 1) in Zhejiang Province.
